TopicTitle: New Stream LIVE on Twitch TV

Articles.Content:
Come and check out my new twitch stream. I am going to be playing KSP as much as possible and I would love for you to all come and comment and join along in the videos! I hope to see you all there! I do not have a set schedule so please remember to click FOLLOW and stay tuned for much KSP madness!!!

http://www.twitch.tv/spootyman

-Spootyman

I will be streaming live today at 11:30am pacific time and randomly throughout the day! I appreciate anyone who wants to come and joing the space adventures!
Wrong place, needs to be in live from mission control.
